title: Input schema of the Sitemap-to-api scraper

sitemaps.title: Sitemap URLs
sitemaps.description: List of sitemap.xml or sitemap index URLs to read and crawl.

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: Max Requests per Crawl
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Maximum number of requests that can be made by this crawler.

extractMainText.title: Extract main text
extractMainText.description: If true, attempt to extract main article/content text and a short snippet.

followInternalOnly.title: Follow internal links only
followInternalOnly.description: If true, only follow links within the same host as each sitemap entry (helps stay within domain).
